title: [Large-Scale] Dynamic Capability Deployment Strategy Design for Multi-Unit Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of organizational management and pedagogy
context.additional_context: Researching Methods to Apply Organizational Capacity-Building Strategies to Language Education Settings for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: The concepts of structural/social capital and knowledge-seeking types (exploitative/exploratory) can be linked to organizational capability deployment
Structural equation modeling can be used to visually analyze capability deployment relationships in multi-unit organizations
Dynamic capability deployment strategies can be designed by applying social capital and knowledge learning types to actual educational cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
